definition: A composition or piece of music, typically referring to a single work or selection within a larger musical context. It is commonly used to describe a specific musical creation, whether it be a song, instrumental piece, or any other form of musical expression.

examples.english: This piece of music is very well-known.

examples.german: Das Musikstück hat einen eingängigen Rhythmus.
examples.english: The music piece has a catchy rhythm.
He composed a beautiful piece of music.

examples.german: Das Musikstück wurde von einem Orchester gespielt.
examples.english: The music piece was played by an orchestra.

examples.german: Das Musikstück hat eine melancholische Stimmung.
examples.english: The music piece has a melancholic mood.
